sqls.sql: SELECT l.ID AS ID, l.LICENCE_NO AS LICENCE_NO, lp.BUSINESS_NAME AS BUSINESS_NAME, p.HCI_CODE AS HCI_CODE, CONCAT(p.BLK_NO , case p.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' ' + p.STREET_NAME end , case p.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' ' + p.BUILDING_NAME end , case p.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # ' + p.FLOOR_NO end , case p.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-' + p.UNIT_NO end , case p.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', ' + p.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS ADDRESS , p.POSTAL_CODE AS POSTAL_CODE, l.SVC_NAME AS SVC_NAME, lp.TCU_DATE AS TCU_DATE, (case when LEN(lp.TCU_DATE_REMARKS) > 50 then CONCAT(subString(lp.TCU_DATE_REMARKS, 1, 50), '...') else lp.TCU_DATE_REMARKS END) AS TCU_DATE_REMARKS FROM hcsal.dbo.lic_premises lp join hcsal.dbo.licence l on lp.LICENCE_ID = l.ID JOIN hcsal.dbo.premises p on lp.PREMISES_ID = p.ID WHERE l.STATUS in ('LICEST001','LICEST007') AND l.ID NOT IN (SELECT l.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID FROM hcsal.dbo.licence l WHERE l.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID IS NOT NULL) <#if licence_no??>AND charindex(:licence_no,l.LICENCE_NO) > 0</#if> <#if hci_code??>AND charindex(:hci_code,p.HCI_CODE) > 0</#if> <#if business_name??>AND charindex(:business_name,lp.BUSINESS_NAME) > 0</#if> <#if postal_code??>AND charindex(:postal_code,p.POSTAL_CODE) > 0</#if> <#if address??>AND :address = l.ADDRESS</#if> <#if svc_name??>AND :svc_name = l.SVC_NAME</#if> <#if date_from??>AND lp.TCU_DATE >= CONVERT(date,:date_from)</#if> <#if date_to??>AND lp.TCU_DATE <= CONVERT(date,:date_to)</#if>
